subject: Nutrition
title: Oxidative Stress Explained
description: A quick win: understand Oxidative Stress Explained.

hook.text: Your body rusts from the inside. Free radicals damage cells the same way oxygen corrodes metal.

buildup.text: Normal metabolism produces free radicals. Antioxidants from food neutralize them before they cause harm.

discovery.text: When free radical production exceeds antioxidant defense, oxidative stress accelerates aging and disease.

twist.text: Megadose antioxidant supplements don't helpâ€”some studies show they actually increase cancer risk.

climax.text: The answer isn't pills but platesâ€”colorful fruits and vegetables provide the right antioxidant balance.

punchline.text: Your body needs antioxidants from food, not bottles.

quiz.question: What happens with megadose antioxidant supplements?
